description: The draft deal includes a number of pledges relating to NI on Brexit and supporting Stormont.
title: Irish government: Where does NI feature in draft deal?
title_page: Irish government: Where does NI feature in draft deal? - BBC News
maintext: It adds that the Irish government will engage with the British government with a view to ensuring access by "an independent, international judicial figure" to all original documents relating to the Dublin and Monaghan Bombings, as well as the Dublin bombings of 1972 and 1971, the bombing of Kay's Tavern and the murder of County Louth man Seamus Ludlow in 1976.
